132848.「選んだ装備に付いてる 錬金効果を\n 全部 新しい効果にチェンジしちゃうよ。\:
I'll change all the alchemical effects on the equipment you've selected to new effects. Which equipment do you want to change the
alchemy effect of?

132849.「この装備の 錬金効果をチェンジするのね！\n 何が付くかは やってみての お楽:
You're going to change the alchemy of this equipment. You'll have to try it to see what it gives you. The fee is <%nL_RENKIN_GOLD>
gold... The current alchemy effect will be completely erased, but can I really try?

132850.<se_nots System 7>\n「お気に入りの 錬金は付いたかな？\n:
Did you find your favorite alchemy? If you have enough gold, you can try as many times as you like, so I'd be happy if you came
back...

132851.「わかったわ。\n そこで 少し待っててね……。\n<bw_break>: I don't know... I'll be right there...<bw_break>

132858.「<%sL_WATASU_ITEM>を\n どれに 変換するんだ？\n<brea: Which one do we convert <%sL_WATASU_ITEM> to?<break>

132859.「オレさまは 今持っている装備を\n 別の装備に 変換することが できるんだ。\:
I can convert your equipment into other equipment... The better the equipment, the higher the price... The better the gear, the
higher the price. I can convert a dagger to a one-handed sword if it's on my body. You can't convert a dagger into a dagger... You
can't. I can do all sorts of things, but each time we meet, it's a one-time thing, so be careful about that...

132860.「選んだ装備品の 錬金効果を\n 全部 新しいものにチェンジしちゃうよ。\n た:
It'll change all the alchemical effects of your chosen equipment to new ones. But not for accessories. The number of effects will
change from the original number... ＋If it's +2, it'll stay +2... But the effect it gives depends on my mood! You can have any effect
you want, no questions asked. And all previous effects will be erased. By the way, some effects are more likely to be attached
to equipment than others... A robe is more likely to have magical effects...

132861.「オレさまは 今持っている装備を\n 別の装備に 変換することが できるんだ。\:
I can convert your equipment into other equipment... The better the equipment, the higher the price... The better the gear, the
higher the price. I can convert a dagger to a one-handed sword if it's on my body. You can't convert a dagger into a dagger... Even
if you convert, you'll keep the alchemy of the equipment, so don't worry about that. You can only convert equipment and reapply
alchemy once each time you meet, so be careful about that...

132862.「あなたの持ってる 装備品に\n 新しい錬金効果を ひとつ付けてあげるよ。\n:
I'll add one new alchemy effect to your equipment. Accessories are not eligible. If you want to add an effect to a piece of
equipment that's already at +3, after you've added the effect, you can choose one to remove. And the effect is up to me! I don't
care what effect you choose. By the way, some effects are more likely to be added depending on the characteristics of the equipment. If
it's a robe, it's more likely to have magical effects...

132864.「わかったぜ。\n そこで 少し待っててくれ……。\n<se Joutyu_SE:
I don't know... I need you to wait there for
a minute...<se Joutyu_SE 40>
<break>
